name: An Offroad Life
description:
This is a Pre Alpha Beta early acces / not finished game

It features a semi-realistic simulation of car behaviour + a prototype of terrain deformation

All the keys are:

Steering: Left/Right arrows

Throttle: Up arrow

Brake: Down arrow

HandBrake: Spacebar

Clutch: Left Shift

Gear Up: X

Gear Down: W

LockRear/Center/FrontDifferential: R ; C ; F

RWD/4WD: D

N2O (not realistic nos just adding more power to the engine for the moment): I

Respawn: A

Low/HighTransfercase(you may need to change gear for applying the changes): T

SwitchFrontLight: N

Thanks for playing, have fun!!
